task.summary: Placing a Tile by checking validity, creating a Tile object, and finally setting the terrains for each hex object.
Placing a Tile by checking validity, creating a Tile object, and finally setting the terrains for each hex object.
Updated Rotate Tile Tests to account for the origin being on an even row and an odd row

Updated tile rotation test so that it has tests for even and odd rows. Updated some logic in placement validity for checking for empty hexes. Added logic in game to place tiles in a loop. Tiles can be placed correctly and incorrectly and have an error message shown.

Updated tile rotation test so that it has tests for even and odd rows. Updated some logic in placement validity for checking for empty hexes. Added logic in game to place tiles in a loop. Tiles can be placed correctly and incorrectly and have an error message shown.

Updated tile rotation test so that it has tests for even and odd rows. Updated some logic in placement validity for checking for empty hexes. Added logic in game to place tiles in a loop. Tiles can be placed correctly and incorrectly and have an error message shown.
Refactored Pieces class to PlayerPieceContainer so its name doesn't clash as much with GamePiece

Added GamePiece abstract class. Meeple, Totoro and Tiger have been updated to extend GamePiece and inherit/override the necessary methods from it. Tests have been updated, a few names have been refactored.
Updated Meeple, Totoro, Tiger and Container tests
